text:
When it comes to keeping track of diabetes, the manual process can be a bit of a pain. That's where Dario Health comes in - an innovative app and device combo that helps users easily track their glucose levels, as well as log food, exercise, and medication.
Dario Health, founded by Dr. Yossi Grossman, is focused on making diabetes management more accessible and user-friendly. The company has developed a smartphone-enabled blood glucose monitor that automatically tracks and logs readings, providing users with real-time insights into their health. With over 10 million measurements tracked through its platform, Dario Health is committed to empowering individuals living with diabetes to take control of their condition.

**The Challenge:**\
With so many different features and capabilities within the app, the navigation was becoming complex. Users were having trouble finding what they needed, leading to frustration and a decrease in engagement. Dario Health recognized that if users couldn't easily find what they needed, they wouldn't stick around to use the app effectively.

**Our Solution:**

To tackle this challenge, I worked closely with the Dario Health team to identify key issues and develop solutions to improve the overall user experience. Here are some highlights from our collaboration:

1. **Simplified Navigation**: We reorganized the main menu, reducing the number of options and creating clear categories for each feature. This allowed users to quickly access the sections they needed most frequently.
